description:
We met and filmed Shane this summer, when he had barely turned 18 just weeks prior.
"I've wanted to do porn since I was like 13," he joked.
He's gay and says he is mostly a top.
"I love fucking a hot guy for hours," he said. "Tear him up!"
I love how open and honest this new generation is. They're fine with who they are, they're fine with who others are, and they know what they want. Things have certainly changed since I was their age!
Shane's got a hot little body on him. And he's a shooter too!
title: Shane
